welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bree, a charming city in Belgium known for its rich history and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Eindhoven Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi for up to 2 hours after watching a short advertisement.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, primarily used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
